inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a value of type 'str' and with values which are a value of type 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: Highpass sigma
inputs.description: A float. Highpass filter sigma (in volumes).

inputs.name: Ignore exception
inputs.description: A boolean. Print an error message instead of throwing an exception in case the interface fails to run.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Image to operate on.

inputs.name: Internal datatype
inputs.description: 'float' or 'char' or 'int' or 'short' or 'double' or 'input'. Datatype to use for calculations (default is float).

inputs.name: Lowpass sigma
inputs.description: A float. Lowpass filter sigma (in volumes).

inputs.name: Nan2zeros
inputs.description: A boolean. Change nans to zeros before doing anything.

inputs.name: Out file
inputs.description: A file name. Image to write.

inputs.name: Output datatype
inputs.description: 'float' or 'char' or 'int' or 'short' or 'double' or 'input'. Datatype to use for output (default uses input type).

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_pair_gz' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti'. Fsl output type.

inputs.name: Terminal output
inputs.description: 'stream' or 'allatonce' or 'file' or 'none'. Control terminal output: `stream` - displays to terminal immediately (default), `allatonce` - waits till command is finished to display output, `file` - writes output to file, `none` - output is ignored.

name: TemporalFilter
description: TemporalFilter, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: TemporalFilter).
